stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
Do you want to transfer your online store from Volusion to Shopify?

Lots of online stores are transferring to Shopify because it better suits their businesses needs.

Unfortunately transferring from Volusion to Shopify can be tricky with all the required data migration and unfamiliar jargon. So instead of hacking it yourself why not get a Shopify expert to transfer it for you?

Now you can have

  • Your entire Volusion store backed up
  • All your products and content pages transferred to Shopify
  • Customer details transferred
  • A shortlist of 3 Shopify themes that closely match your Volusion store*
  • A new Shopify theme installed

It's never been easier to move from Volusion to Shopify. What are you waiting for? Start today!

*This service does not include purchase of a new Shopify theme. We will recommend 3 themes which the customer will need to purchase

What can I expect?

  • Backup Existing Volusion Store
  • Transfer All products
  • Transfer all Customer Data
  • Transfer all content pages
  • Shortlist 3 Shopify Themes
  • Install new Shopify theme
title: Transfer from Volusion to Shopify
